events.message: I received my order yesterday, but unfortunately the product has a large scratch on the surface and does not look new at all.
The customer's message indicates a product defect based on the report of a scratch and damage upon delivery.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah Thompson to handle the defect claim and assist the customer further.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. I'm sorry to hear your product arrived damaged. I'm here to help resolve this issue.
Could you please send us photos of the scratch and any other damage on the product so that we can assess the situation quickly?
I have attached the pictures showing the scratch on the top cover and the dent on the side. Please check them and let me know what can be done.
Thank you for sending the photos. We can offer you a replacement product shipped at no extra cost, or a full refund if you prefer.
I would like to receive the replacement product as soon as possible. Thank you for solving this issue so quickly.
We have processed your replacement order and it will be shipped within 24 hours. You will receive tracking info shortly.
Just following up to confirm you received the replacement product and that it meets your expectations. Let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since you have confirmed receipt and satisfaction with the replacement, we will now close this case. Thank you for your patience.
Please take a moment to complete a short survey regarding your recent support experience to help us improve our service.
